New Card Customers who activate the Eligible Credit Card, and successfully apply for Cash Instalment Plan with an approved withdrawal amount equal to or above HK$20,000 and with a repayment period of 12 months or above within the first 60 calendar days after card issuance, can enjoy an extra $200 RewardCash.
The RewardCash rebates of the HSBC Red Credit Card are subject to the relevant terms and conditions. Exclusions apply. For details, please visit Reward Scheme terms and conditions for the relevant eligible transaction and other rebate requirement. Top-up transactions for stored value cards or e-wallets (other than Octopus or PayMe) are excluded from eligible transactions.
